Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about Klaus and Isabella are discussing the upcoming Potluck event, with Klaus considering making a vegan lasagna and the two planning to meet at the library to go over research on gentrification before the Potluck. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Klaus, it's great to see you here having dinner! I hope you're enjoying the meal.
Klaus Mueller
Hey Isabella, thanks! The food here is always great. Are you excited about the Potluck tomorrow?
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm glad you're enjoying the food! I'm definitely looking forward to the Potluck tomorrow. Are you bringing a dish?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, I'm thinking of bringing a vegan dish to the Potluck. Do you have any recommendations for what I should make?
Isabella Rodriguez
How about trying a vegan lasagna? It's a crowd favorite and always a hit at the Potluck.
Klaus Mueller
That sounds like a great idea! I'll definitely consider making a vegan lasagna for the Potluck. Thanks for the suggestion, Isabella!
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm also excited to discuss our research on gentrification at the library tomorrow morning. Would you like to meet up before the Potluck to go over our plans?
Klaus Mueller
That sounds like a plan. Let's meet up at the library at 9 am to go over our research before the Potluck.
Isabella Rodriguez
Great! I'll see you at the library at 9 am tomorrow then. Enjoy the rest of your meal, Klaus!

Maria Lopez.description: streaming games on Twitch (resuming gameplay) @ the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:common room:common room sofa
